About

12+ years of experience in the IT field with a focus on designing and implementing large scale IT systems for world's biggest companies. Highly motived, tech-savvy, team supporting and customer-oriented person.

Professional knowledge of: software design, enterprise architecturem project management and project delivery methods, BPM, CRM, Low-code platforms and Pega 7/8 suite.
